name: Rock Dating Sim
description:
You argued with your friends and ran deep into the forest. As always, you wonder what did you do wrong? As you walked aimlessly you eventually got lost, but then noticed a huge rock in the middle of a small field encircled by trees. You had the feeling that this rock can speak so you decided to try and invite it for a date.

Written, Drawn and Developed by: Adam Csondes (https://linktr.ee/mumsflipflops)

Music by: Klaudia Bereczki (https://soundcloud.com/user-88549759)

Rock and Romantic music: Total Music Collection (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/total-music-collect...)

Tool used: Dialogue Editor (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/dialogue-editor-168329)
